info.name: Murder Mystery 2 - Dark (Discourse)
info.description: A dark version of the Murder Mystery 2 forums.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.1 - Changed title colors back to white.
v0.2 - Changed 'About Me' textbox to grey in the Preferences.
v0.3 - Made the link in the user card more visible.
v0.4 - Fixed the white category notification dropdown.
v0.5 - LOTS of visual improvements!
v0.6 - Minor visual improvements.
v0.7 - Less intensity in the thread titles.
v0.8 - Similar topics box fix + Reply button.
v0.9 - Fixed the Pinned/Unpinned dropdown menu.
v1.0 - Reverted onebox link color to default.
v1.1 - Fixed various poll issues.
v1.2 - Finishing touches.
v1.3 - Final visual update. (Will continue to fix bugs (if any))
v1.4 - Fixed wrapper bug from highlight.

Credits to maxigaz.
